body_content.explanation: an organization that represents the people who collect and deliver the post and discusses their pay and working conditions with employers:
examples: Postal unions are among the strongest trade unions.
The leaders of the postal union were pleased with the new safety measures.

body_content.explanation: short form of Universal Postal Union: an organization that agrees international rules and standards relating to postal (= relating to post) services :
examples: The gradual extension of the Postal Union to include the whole world is a great example of international cooperation.
Some countries supported the proposal to set up an international postal union.
The Universal Postal Union standardized international postal rates and services.
